title: BRIEF-Brait SE Engaged In An Extensive Process To Materially Reduce Debt
text:
BRIEF-Brait SE Engaged In An Extensive Process To Materially Reduce Debt

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 23, 2019 08:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Brait SE Engaged In An Extensive Process To Materially Reduce Debt Sept 23 (Reuters) - Brait SE : * TITAN HAS CONFIRMED TO BOARD IT INTENDS TO REMAIN A SIGNIFICANT AND STRATEGIC SHAREHOLDER IN BRAIT * BOARD OF BRAIT AND BRAIT'S CORPORATE ADVISORS AND BRAIT ADVISORY SERVICES HAVE BEEN ENGAGED IN AN EXTENSIVE PROCESS TO MATERIALLY REDUCE DEBT * PROCESSES MAY INVOLVE A REFINANCING OF EXISTING DEBT, POTENTIAL EQUITY RAISING INITIATIVES, RECAPITALISATION OF GROUP * PROCESSES MAY INVOLVE DIVESTITURES OR A COMBINATION OF FOREGOING * INITIATIVES ARE AT AN ADVANCED STAGE TO SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCE NET OPERATING COSTS OF BRAIT

BRIEF-Brait SE Engaged In An Extensive Process To Materially Reduce Debt
description: BRIEF-Brait SE Engaged In An Extensive Process To Materially Reduce Debt
